Description.Name: Repaired Mechbay
Description.Details: Enables to Drop 1 additional Mech. Requires Command Console Upgrades to Control the Pilot! The first cradle turned out alright, boss. There's enough scrap left lying around we should be able to construct the bones of a gantry for the next, but we're also gonna need to buy several complex components to get the next cradle ready for use. Since this is even more of a creative upgrad than the last, our pilots will need top end training to interface directly with their 'Mech.

AssignedCastDescription: This will use up the last of the parts that weren't salvaged, but at least we were able to keep the costs down, right?
